sentences.en: "I have never knowingly exposed any patient to needless risks," he said.
sentences.cn: 他说：“我从未故意将任何病人置于不必要的风险境地。”

sentences.en: All this, needless to say, had been culled second-hand from radio reports.
sentences.cn: 不用说，所有这些都是从电台报道中采集来的二手材料。
查尔斯痛恨不必要的浪费。

sentences.en: He crossed off the needless words in his composition.
sentences.cn: 他从作文中把不必要的字都删掉了.

sentences.en: It is needless to sweep a clean floor.
sentences.cn: 去扫干净的地板没必要.

sentences.en: Last night we all had a needless scare. "
sentences.cn: 大家空受了一晚上的虚惊. ”

sentences.en: Needless to say, I agree with you.

sentences.cn: 无须说, 我是同意的.

sentences.en: Needless to say, learning without thinking is useless.
sentences.cn: 不用说, 学而不思则罔.

sentences.en: Needless to say, theory and practice sometimes diverged.
sentences.cn: 不用说，理论和实践有时候并不相符。

sentences.en: Needless to say, we rejected the Soviet definition.
sentences.cn: 不用说, 我们拒绝了苏联的定义.

sentences.en: Needless to say, we shall refund any expenses you may incur.
sentences.cn: 不用说, 我们将会偿还你所担负的任何费用.

sentences.en: Never a needless jar was made.
sentences.cn: 绝对不带半点不必要的刺激.

sentences.en: Our budgie got out of its cage while our cat was in the room. Needless to say, the cat moved quicker than me and caught it.
sentences.cn: 我们的虎皮鹦鹉飞出鸟笼的时候，猫正好在室内。不用说，猫比我快，抓住了它。

sentences.en: So much needless repetition makes the article long - winded.
sentences.cn: 这样叠床架屋,文章就太罗嗦了.

sentences.en: The only thing he could regret was his needless dread.
sentences.cn: 他唯一觉得遗憾的,是自己不必要的恐惧.

sentences.en: The report caused needless anxiety to women who have attended the clinic.
sentences.cn: 那份报告让去那家诊所就诊过的妇女产生了不必要的忧虑。

sentences.en: We need to bring to an end these needless deaths.
sentences.cn: 我们必须终止这些无谓的死亡。

words.tran_cn: 需要，要求；缺乏；必要之物
需要；必须；缺少（need的三单形式）
不需要的,不必要的,多余的

trans.tran_cn: 不需要的，不必要的，无用的，多余的
trans.tran_en: needless troubles, suffering, loss etc are unnecessary because they could easily have been avoided
